name: Tumblr #bluespace border
description:
Borders all posts on your dashboard in a darker blue. Now you don't have to rely on people tagging their stuff with #bluespace
Feel free to make suggestions, as I'm not in the target group of this userstyle.

user.name: Mike Gebirge
user.about: I'm just some tumblr user that is annoyed by tumblr's shortcomings that even I can fix in a few minutes. So here they are, a few of them. For updates, follow http://kedaiyis-fixes.tumblr.com/
